titles.title: Senior Nutrition Funding Act of 1997
To provide additional appropriations for certain nutrition programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 11/9/1997--Introduced. Senior Nutrition Funding Act of 1997 - Provides additional appropriations for FY 1999 and 2000 for purposes of making grants under the Older Americans Act of 1965 for congregate nutrition and home delivered nutrition programs.
